products.name: Arduino Uno R4 WiFi
products.description: The Arduino Uno R4 WiFi upgrades the classic board with a 32-bit RA4M1 processor and an ESP32-S3 module for built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity.

products.name: DHT22 Sensor
products.description: A calibrated digital signal output sensor for measuring temperature and humidity.

products.name: HC-SR04 Ultrasonic
products.description: A non-contact distance measurement module capable of sensing ranges from 2cm to 400cm.

products.name: HC-SR501 PIR Sensor
products.description: A passive infrared sensor designed to detect motion based on the infrared heat emitted by moving bodies.
